title: Marketing Coordinator
job_overview:
Are you a creative, results-driven marketer ready to make a real impact?

We’re looking for a skilled and reliable Marketing Coordinator to join our growing vacation rental business at Lunabase.

In this role, you'll own our marketing efforts from strategy to execution—playing a key part in shaping our brand, driving engagement, and growing our community across channels.
________________________________________

Key Responsibilities

Social Media Management (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn)
•	Manage and grow our presence across key platforms
•	Plan and publish engaging, high-quality content tailored to our target audiences
•	Engage with followers, respond to comments/DMs, and foster community
•	Edit and produce short-form video content (Reels) using CapCut or similar tools
•	Track trends and optimize content for reach and relevance
•	Conduct keyword research and implement SEO best practices into social media copy
 
Email Marketing & Collateral Development
•	Create and manage email campaigns in Klaviyo to drive engagement and retention
•	Design branded marketing materials including flyers, brochures, and digital assets
•	Track performance metrics and optimize campaigns based on data insights

Website & Blog Content
•	Maintain and update our WordPress website to ensure functionality and a smooth user experience
•	Write SEO-optimized blog posts aligned with our content strategy and market positioning
•	Monitor performance and suggest improvements based on analytics
________________________________________

Requirements
•	Proven experience in social media management and content creation
•	Strong writing and communication skills
•	Proficiency in Canva, WordPress, Klaviyo, and CapCut
•	Ability to manage multiple projects independently and meet deadlines
________________________________________

Bonus Skills
•	Experience with Photoshop, Google Analytics, Buffer
•	Familiarity with Google Ads, Facebook Ads, or other digital advertising platforms
•	Knowledge of PPC strategies and campaign execution
________________________________________

Why Join Lunabase?
•	Flexible, part-time virtual role
•	Direct impact on a fast-growing vacation rental brand
•	Opportunity to own creative projects from start to finish
•	Collaborative and supportive team environment
•	Room for professional growth
________________________________________

About Us:
Lunabase is a vacation rental company focused on delivering high-end guest experiences while maximizing profitability for property owners. With a strong presence in markets like Miami and Lake Tahoe, we combine creative branding with data-driven strategies to stand out in a competitive industry.
________________________________________

Ready to bring your marketing skills to a brand that values innovation and impact? Apply now!
